scripts.release: npm run build && cd lib && npm publish && cd ..
scripts.push-build: npm run build && cd lib && yalc push && cd ..
scripts.build-dev: npm run ts:check && npm run build:prep && NODE_ENV=development npm run build:sources
scripts.build: npm run ts:check && npm run build:prep && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:sources
scripts.build:prep: npm run clean && cp package.json README.md lib
